title: Dearne Valley Park Walking and Cycle Route
description: Enjoy a short walk or cycle around the pretty Dearne Valley Park in Barnsley. You can follow the path alongside the River Dearne, around the pond and through the peaceful woodland. The park is located just a mile from Barnsley town centre. If you would like to continue your walk/ride then you could follow either the Dearne Way or the Trans Pennine Trail as these run just past the park.
display_address: Pontefract Road, Beevor Industrial Estate, Monk Bretton, Cudworth, Barnsley, South Yorkshire, England, S71 1HX, United Kingdom
